Get a rating table

cdec_rt.Rd

Use station id to find the rating table for stage to flow used by CDEC.

cdec_rt(station_id)

Arguments

station_id

three letter CDEC station id

Value

dataframe of rating table, with stage (feet) and flow (cfs) as columns

Examples

cdec_rt("abj") # get the stage to rating curve for ABJ
#> # A tibble: 240 x 2
#>    rating_stage  flow
#>           <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1        0.200   NA 
#>  2        0.300    5.
#>  3        0.400    7.
#>  4        0.500   11.
#>  5        0.600   14.
#>  6        0.700   18.
#>  7        0.800   22.
#>  8        0.900   27.
#>  9        1.00    32.
#> 10        1.10    37.
#> # ... with 230 more rows
